entry.title: LES SUÃŠTES WIND WARNING , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 3:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: WNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over the Highlands. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 130 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 130 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence in the evening. Wind becoming south 40 gusting to 70 late in the evening. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
